title: Scripts and Smurfs
body:
Hello, just curious if you are allowed to run scripts on this game?
Am I allowed to make a new account and play on it? Seems most people that have no games have a higher success rate in ranked in my experience. The people with 100 normal games and that are unranked always stomp the games, maybe its a secret hidden buff to accounts with no games, but I'm pretty certain that you are only allowed one account, if so that mean majority of the community are cheaters. Should we all join the band wagon?
Can anyone elaborate?
